臡字的基本解释

臡
ní
带骨的肉酱。

臡
luán
古同“脔”。

臡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］
［《廣韻》奴低切，平齊，泥。］
［《廣韻》人兮切，平齊，日。］
［《廣韻》諾何切，平歌，泥。］
(1)有骨的肉酱。亦泛指肉酱。
(2)用作比喻。

臡字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　臡； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页999第03
【廣韻】奴低切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】年題切，?音泥。【玉篇】麋臡，肝髓醢也。又有骨醢也。【廣韻】雜骨醬也。【韻會】作醢及臡者，必先煿乾其肉，乃後莝之，雜以粱麴及鹽酒，置甀中，百日則熟。【釋名】臡，胒也，骨肉相摶，胒無汁也。【周禮·天官·醢人】朝事之豆，其實韭菹酖醢，昌本麋臡。【註】臡，亦醢也。或曰醬也。有骨爲臡，無骨爲醢。【禮·郊特牲·恆豆之菹水草之和氣也註】天子朝事之豆，有昌本麋臡。　又【廣韻】人兮切【集韻】人移切，?音腝。又【廣韻】諾何切，音那。又【五音集韻】汝來切，音荋。義?同。

臡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
臡字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
臡
ní
Bone-in meat sauce.
臡
luán
The ancient same "脔".
臡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ní]
["Guangyun" slave low-cut, flat, muddy. ]
["Guangyun" people are cut, even, day. ]
["Guangyun" Nuoheqie, Pingge, Clay. ]
(1) Bone-in meat sauce. Also refers to meat sauce.
(2) Used as a metaphor.
臡

[Guang Yun] Slave low cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Year title cut,? Yin mud. [Jade articles] Moose, liver marrow also. There are also bones. [Guang Yun] Mixed bone sauce also. [Rhyme Club] Those who make 醢 and 膡 must first simmer and dry the meat, and then mix it with glutinous rice and salt wine, put it in the middle, and it will be cooked in a hundred days. [Release name] Zang, Zang Ye, flesh and blood, and Zang has no juice. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan·Xianren】The bean of the dynasty is actually the leek scorpion scorpion, Changben moose. [Note] 臡, also 醢也. Or called sauce too. Bone is scum, without bones is glutinous. [Rituals, special sacrifices in the suburbs, and the harmony of the potted plants of the constant bean] The beans of the emperor's court, there is Changben elk.　[Guangyun] People are cut and cut [Jiyun] People are moved and cut,? Sounds. [Guang Yun] Nuohe cut, sound that. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] Nilai cut, sound. Righteous? Same.
